title: Meningococcemia Medication: Antimicrobial agents, Corticosteroids, Vaccines, Inactivated, Bacterial
author: Journal Article
description: Meningococcemia is defined as dissemination of meningococci (Neisseria meningitidis) into the bloodstream (see the image below). Patients with acute infection can present clinically with (1) meningitis, (2) meningitis with meningococcemia, or (3) meningococcemia without obvious meningitis.
